Are you expecting that a client should "guess" the next state transitio=
n out of the blue?  I'm not sure this is possible.  Some knowledge has to b=
e provided (I think) out of band that explains "relationships" in some way =
such that a client can be programmed to traverse the state transitions.  Th=
e key (in my opinion) is that the out of band information are not URIs but =
rather "identifiers" for relationships e.g. Atom uses "rel" to indicate rel=
ationships and basically monikers like "self" have meaning within the proto=
col.
